name: ai-summary
description: This repository will hold a AI Summary extension project. The goal of this project is to create a website that will display the extension with intriguing  visuals that will capture the essence of this project. It will have a signup feature as well as social media accounts to promote this project. The extension  will be displayed once the user has created a account and signed up for this free service. Once the extension is downloaded it clicked on the user will have  the ability to highlight a piece of text and AI will create a summary od the text that was highlighted.
